title: Mediterranean pasta salad

ingredients.content: Ingredients
Pesto
50 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)
1 garlic clove
40 g fresh basil, leaves only
20 g fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
160 g roasted cashews
60 - 80 g olive oil, plus extra for covering the dip (see Tips)
1 - 2 tbsp white wine vinegar, to taste
Salad
900 g water, plus extra for cooling eggs
3 eggs
250 g farfalle pasta (bow tie pasta)
2 tbsp olive oil
200 g marinated artichoke hearts, drained and cut into halves
30 g rocket or fresh spinach leaves
100 g cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
50 g pitted Kalamata olives, cut into halves
1 - 2 pinches salt, to taste
1 - 2 pinches ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place Parmesan and garlic into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add all remaining pesto ingredients and chop <b>Turbo/1 sec/3-4 times<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position and place eggs into Varoma dish. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Set Varoma aside. Add pasta to mixing bowl and place Varoma with eggs back into position. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>8-12 min/Varoma//speed <b>, or until pasta is al dente.

Remove Varoma and place eggs into a bowl of cool water to cease cooking. Drain pasta through Varoma dish, then transfer into a large serving bowl with olive oil and 4 tablespoons of the reserved pesto. Gently toss oil and pesto through pasta until combined, then set aside to cool (approx. 15 min).

Peel eggs, chop into eighths and add to serving bowl. Place serving bowl onto mixing bowl lid, then weigh artichoke hearts, rocket or spinach leaves, cherry tomatoes and Kalamata olives into it. Season to taste with pepper and salt. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Pasta that is cooked al dente is tender but still firm to the bite.
Place leftover pesto in a sealable container, cover with extra olive oil and place into refrigerator.
